tests.explanation: The original program correctly identifies the index of the beginning of the pattern within the subject. The mutant code changes the while loop condition to break out of the loop if the pattern is found and if the end of the subject is reached, which incorrectly returns -1 for this test case.
This test case has the pattern at the end of the subject, and both the original program and the mutant correctly identify the index of the beginning of the pattern.
